enhanced_description: HR Neeti Private Limited, established in 2011 as HR Transformation Consultants, developed HR Neeti Cloud HCM as a business sustainability tool. This end-to-end Human Capital Management solution is available on Cloud and Mobile platforms, designed to simplify HR processes from Workforce Planning to Increments and real-time People Analytics, with Performance Management at its core. Rated 4.9 in Customer Service on Capterra, the company has transformed work for over 10,000 employees across India. Their unique engagement model combines HR consulting expertise (including establishing HR Governance Frameworks and Compensation Strategy) with their Cloud HCM software, positioning them as partners in their clients' HR transformation journey up the HR Maturity Curve. The platform is highlighted for its flexibility to handle multiple businesses with multi-locational presence and unique policies, its cost-effectiveness by saving infrastructure and maintenance costs, and its accessibility across various devices including desktops, laptops, tabs, and mobiles.
